Package main.sound

package main.sound
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    main
     
  • Class
    Description
    BellNote
    Represents a musical note to be played by a bell, consisting of a pitch (Note) and a duration (NoteLength).
    Note
    A note is part of a standard 13-note scale, where the note 'middle A' (440Hz) is identified by "A4", and an A an octave higher would be identified as "A5". Sharp notes are indicated by appending S to the standard note, so middle A # would be indicated by 'A4S'. Flat notes are equivalent to a sharp of the lower note, so to identify B flat, use 'A4F'. A REST note (nothing is played) is identified by 'REST'.
    NoteLength
    In music, common lengths are whole, half, quarter, and eighth notes.
